modelCorrections.rawOutput:
Here's the corrected HTML based on the WCAG 2.1 violation description and the provided example:

- Corrected HTML: <a class="elementor-icon elementor-social-icon elementor-social-icon- elementor-repeater-item-dc10550" href="https://twitter.com/NuORDER" target="_blank" aria-label="Twitter">

Explanation:
The original HTML link element lacks accessible text for screen readers. To fix this, I added the `aria-label` attribute with the value "Twitter" to provide a clear and concise description of the link's purpose. This ensures that screen reader users will understand where the link leads to when they encounter it.
